title: New: TULA – Another Kind of Red
content:
Was a huge fan of River, a single released last year by Swedish singer Tula, and her latest offering, Another Kind of Red doesn’t disappoint.

With another two singles expected later in the year, also produced by Klas Ahlund, it’s hugely ambitious sounding pop songwriting that deserves to reach a large audience. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
